description:
Being an esper seems cool on TV, but in http://anidb.net/ch81960 [Saiki Kusuo]`s life as a normal teenager it`s a real drag.
Source: netflix
Note: 1-5 are previously unadapted side stories of previous seasons. 6 features the epilogue/continuation of the franchise.

REGULAR.description:
Kusuo and his "friends" search for a missing dog. Kusuo discovers the intricacies of online gaming, then the world of adults as his father`s stand-in.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Sannin no Otoko to Youjo to Keikan to Ato Inu / Game no Sekai e Sign In / Keisai Kiki!? Shuuensha no Oshigoto / Saishi Jiman! Mama Tomo Kaigi / Jiman no Nendosaiku o Hirou Shiyou
Three Men, a Little Girl, a Police Officer and a Dog / Sign In to the Game World / Publishing Crisis? Working at Shuensha / Proud Mom of a Son! Mom`s Meetup / Let`s Show Our Proud Clay Work

세 남자와 소녀와 경찰과 개 / 게임 세계로 로그인 / 마감 위기? 슈엔샤의 업무 / 아들 자랑! 엄마 모임 / 점토 작품을 자랑하자

REGULAR.description:
Broken headgear spells trouble for Kusuo`s home life. Kaido ropes his friends into a children`s card game and loses in more ways than one.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Chou (Muda) Nouryoku no Sainan / Saikyou Deck o Kumiagero! / Sai wa Nagerareta...! Gekitou Card Battle / Saiko Metori no Shouri no Houteishiki / Yuusha no Sainan

초(무쓸모)능력의 재앙 / 최강의 덱을 만들자 / 주사위는 던져졌다! 격전의 카드 배틀 / 사이코 메토리의 승리 방정식 / 용자의 재난

REGULAR.description:
A sincere new teacher`s creepy-looking face leads to mishaps and misunderstandings when the class sets out to find a peeping tom.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Isai o Hanatsu Shinnin Kyoushi Arawaru / Shintai Sokutei no Sainan / Ryoushinfuzai no Tomodachi no Ie ni Asobi ni Ikou / Mezase! Jump Keisai / Mina-sama mo Zehi Ichido Ashi o Hakonde Mite Kudasai

REGULAR.description:
Toritsuka ropes Kusuo into helping him after a cute transfer student bumbles into their lives. She might be more than Kusuo can handle.
Source: Netflix

REGULAR.description:
Nendo`s friends get mistaken for bullies. Kusuo escapes his friends before their plans to have an escape room adventure become reality.
Source: Netflix

REGULAR.description:
Kusuo is now a third-year student living as a normal teenager with no psychic powers. Sort of. But being normal is harder than he thought.
Source: Netflix
